file.name: ocvn_openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Open Contracting Dashboards API
  description: These endpoints are used to feed the open contracting dashboard
  license:
    name: MIT License
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
  version: "1.0"
servers:
- url: http://localhost:50104/
tags:
- name: flag-i-004-stats-controller
  description: Flag I 004 Stats Controller
- name: flag-i-019-stats-controller
  description: Flag I 019 Stats Controller
- name: tenders-by-item-classification
  description: Tenders By Item Classification
- name: flag-i-038-stats-controller
  description: Flag I 038 Stats Controller
- name: supplier-search-controller
  description: Supplier Search Controller
- name: average-number-of-tenderers-controller
  description: Average Number Of Tenderers Controller
- name: city-search-controller
  description: City Search Controller
- name: excel-export-controller
  description: Excel Export Controller
- name: flag-i-007-release-search-controller
  description: Flag I 007 Release Search Controller
- name: funding-by-location-controller
  description: Funding By Location Controller
- name: procuring-entity-search-controller
  description: Procuring Entity Search Controller
- name: tender-percentages-excel-controller
  description: Tender Percentages Excel Controller
- name: tenders-awards-years
  description: Tenders Awards Years
- name: flag-i-003-release-search-controller
  description: Flag I 003 Release Search Controller
- name: flag-i-004-release-search-controller

- name: percentage-awards-narrow-publication-dates
  description: Percentage Awards Narrow Publication Dates
- name: contr-method-search-controller
  description: Contr Method Search Controller
- name: top-ten-controller
  description: Top Ten Controller
- name: flag-i-019-release-search-controller
  description: Flag I 019 Release Search Controller
- name: flag-i-077-release-search-controller
  description: Flag I 077 Release Search Controller
- name: total-cancelled-tenders-excel-controller
  description: Total Cancelled Tenders Excel Controller
- name: org-group-search-controller
  description: Org Group Search Controller
- name: tenders-by-item-excel-controller
  description: Tenders By Item Excel Controller
- name: bid-types-search-controller
  description: Bid Types Search Controller
- name: tender-price-excel-controller
  description: Tender Price Excel Controller
- name: frequent-tenderers-controller
  description: Frequent Tenderers Controller
- name: tenders-awards-value-intervals
  description: Tenders Awards Value Intervals
- name: count-plans-tenders-awards-controller
  description: Count Plans Tenders Awards Controller
- name: org-department-search-controller
  description: Org Department Search Controller
- name: ocds-controller
  description: Ocds Controller
- name: bid-selection-method-search-controller
  description: Bid Selection Method Search Controller
- name: frequent-suppliers-time-interval-controller

- name: flag-i-077-stats-controller
  description: Flag I 077 Stats Controller

  description: Location Search Controller
- name: flag-i-180-stats-controller
  description: Flag I 180 Stats Controller
- name: cost-effectiveness-visuals-controller
  description: Cost Effectiveness Visuals Controller
- name: cost-effectiveness-excel-controller
  description: Cost Effectiveness Excel Controller
- name: tender-price-by-type-year-controller
  description: Tender Price By Type Year Controller
- name: flag-i-038-release-search-controller
  description: Flag I 038 Release Search Controller
- name: procurement-method-search-controller
  description: Procurement Method Search Controller
- name: average-number-of-tenderers-excel-controller
  description: Average Number Of Tenderers Excel Controller
- name: procurement-activity-by-year-controller
  description: Procurement Activity By Year Controller

  description: Buyer Search Controller

  description: Flag I 180 Release Search Controller

  description: Tender Percentages Controller
- name: total-cancelled-tenders-by-year-controller
  description: Total Cancelled Tenders By Year Controller

paths:
  /api/averageAwardPeriod:
    get:
      tags:
      - average-tender-and-award-periods-controller
      summary: Calculates the average award period, per each year. The year is taken
        from awards.date and the duration is taken by counting the daysbetween tender.tenderPeriod.endDate
        and tender.tenderPeriod.startDate. The award has to be active.
      operationId: averageAwardPeriodUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum
          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing
          if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month
          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: monthly
        in: query
        description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly
          grouping of all results. The default is false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: bidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements
          that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notProcuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: supplierId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: bidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: contrMethod
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from
          1 to 5.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: tenderLoc
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: minTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: minAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/awardValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: procuringEntityCityId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the City Id of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.address.postalCode
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityDepartmentId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.department._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: procuringEntityGroupId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.group._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: pageNumber
        in: query
        description: This is the page number to be displayed. If unspecified it starts
          with the first page which is page 0
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: pageSize
        in: query
        description: This defines how many elements to display on each page. It defaults
          to 300 .You can have a maximum of 1000 elements on each page.Larger values
          are not allowed because they can crash your browser.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/DBObject'
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
    post:
      tags:
      - average-tender-and-award-periods-controller
      summary: Calculates the average award period, per each year. The year is taken

      - name: bidTypeId

      - name: notProcuringEntityId

      - name: tenderLoc

      - name: minTenderValue

      - name: maxTenderValue

      - name: minAwardValue

          content: {}
        404:

          content: {}
  /api/averageNumberOfTenderers:

  /api/averageTenderPeriod:
    get:
      tags:
      - average-tender-and-award-periods-controller
      summary: Calculates the average tender period, per each year. The year is taken
        from tender.tenderPeriod.startDate and the duration is taken by counting the
        daysbetween tender.tenderPeriod.endDate and tender.tenderPeriod.startDate
      operationId: averageTenderPeriodUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query

          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

        explode: true

          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing

          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.

  /api/costEffectivenessTenderAmount:
    get:
      tags:
      - cost-effectiveness-visuals-controller
      summary: 'Cost effectiveness of Tenders: Displays the total amount of the active
        tenders that have active awards, grouped by year. Only tenders.status=activeare
        taken into account. The year is calculated from tenderPeriod.startDate'
      operationId: costEffectivenessTenderAmountUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: groupByCategory
        in: query
        description: 'This parameter specified which category can be used for grouping
          the results. Possible values here are: bidSelectionMethod, bidTypeId, procuringEntityId.'
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.

  /api/frequentSuppliersTimeInterval:
    get:
      tags:
      - frequent-suppliers-time-interval-controller
      summary: Returns the frequent suppliers of a procuringEntity split by a time
        interval. The time interval is a parameter and represents the number of days
        to take as interval, starting with today and going back till the last award
        date. The awards are grouped by procuringEntity, supplier and the time interval.
        maxAwards parameter is used to designate what is the maximum number of awards
        granted to one supplier by the same procuringEntity inside one timeInterval.
        The default value for maxAwards is 3 (days) and the default value for intervalDays
        is 365.
      operationId: frequentSuppliersTimeIntervalUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: intervalDays
        in: query
        description: intervalDays
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          default: 365
      - name: maxAwards
        in: query
        description: maxAwards
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          default: 3
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/FrequentSuppliersTuple'
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}
    post:
      tags:
      - frequent-suppliers-time-interval-controller
      summary: Returns the frequent suppliers of a procuringEntity split by a time
        interval. The time interval is a parameter and represents the number of days
        to take as interval, starting with today and going back till the last award
        date. The awards are grouped by procuringEntity, supplier and the time interval.
        maxAwards parameter is used to designate what is the maximum number of awards
        granted to one supplier by the same procuringEntity inside one timeInterval.
        The default value for maxAwards is 3 (days) and the default value for intervalDays
        is 365.
      operationId: frequentSuppliersTimeIntervalUsingPOST
      parameters:
      - name: intervalDays
        in: query
        description: intervalDays
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          default: 365
      - name: maxAwards
        in: query
        description: maxAwards
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          default: 3
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/FrequentSuppliersTuple'
        201:
          description: Created
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}

  /api/ocds/package/all:
    get:
      tags:
      - ocds-controller
      summary: Returns all available packages, filtered by the given criteria.This
        will contain the OCDS package information (metadata about publisher) plus
        the release itself.
      operationId: ocdsPackagesUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum
          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing
          if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month
          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: monthly
        in: query
        description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly
          grouping of all results. The default is false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: bidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements
          that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notProcuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: supplierId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: bidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: contrMethod
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from
          1 to 5.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: tenderLoc
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: minTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: minAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/awardValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: procuringEntityCityId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the City Id of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.address.postalCode
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityDepartmentId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.department._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: procuringEntityGroupId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.group._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: pageNumber
        in: query
        description: This is the page number to be displayed. If unspecified it starts
          with the first page which is page 0
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: pageSize
        in: query
        description: This defines how many elements to display on each page. It defaults
          to 300 .You can have a maximum of 1000 elements on each page.Larger values
          are not allowed because they can crash your browser.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReleasePackage'
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}

  /api/ocds/percentTendersUsingEBidExcelChart:
    get:
      tags:
      - tender-percentages-excel-controller
      summary: Exports *Percent of Tenders Using e-Bid* dashboard in Excel format.
      operationId: percentTendersUsingEBidExcelChartUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum
          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing
          if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month
          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: monthly
        in: query
        description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly
          grouping of all results. The default is false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: bidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements
          that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notProcuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: supplierId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: bidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: contrMethod
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from
          1 to 5.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: tenderLoc
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: minTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: minAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/awardValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: procuringEntityCityId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the City Id of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.address.postalCode
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityDepartmentId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.department._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: procuringEntityGroupId
        in: query
        description: This will search after the DepartmentId of the procuring entity.The
          field is organization.group._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: pageNumber
        in: query
        description: This is the page number to be displayed. If unspecified it starts
          with the first page which is page 0
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      - name: pageSize
        in: query
        description: This defines how many elements to display on each page. It defaults
          to 300 .You can have a maximum of 1000 elements on each page.Larger values
          are not allowed because they can crash your browser.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content: {}
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content: {}
        403:
          description: Forbidden
          content: {}
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content: {}

        the total number of tenders and total number of cancelled tenders for each

  /api/qualityFundingByTenderDeliveryLocation:
    get:
      tags:
      - funding-by-location-controller
      summary: Calculates percentage of releases with tender with at least one specified
        delivery location, that is the array tender.items.deliveryLocation has to
        have items.Filters out stub tenders, therefore tender.tenderPeriod.startDate
        has to exist.
      operationId: qualityFundingByTenderDeliveryLocationUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum
          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing
          if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month
          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: monthly
        in: query
        description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly

    get:
      tags:
      - top-ten-controller
      summary: 'Returns the top ten largest active awards. The amount is taken from
        the award.value field. The returned data will containthe following fields:
        planning.bidNo, awards.date, awards.suppliers.name, awards.value.amount, awards.suppliers.name,
        planning.budget (if any)'

        filter uses the awards.date field.

  /api/totalCancelledTendersByYearByRationale:
    get:
      tags:
      - total-cancelled-tenders-by-year-controller
      summary: Total Cancelled tenders by year by cancel reason. The tender amount
        is read from tender.value.The tender status has to be 'cancelled'. The year
        is retrieved from tender.tenderPeriod.startDate.The cancellation reason is
        read from tender.cancellationRationale.
      operationId: totalCancelledTendersByYearByRationaleUsingGET
      parameters:
      - name: year
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on year. The minimum
          year allowed is 1900 and the maximum allowed is 2200.It will check if the
          startDate and endDate are within the year range. To check which fields are
          used to read start/endDate from, have a look at each endpoint definition.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: month
        in: query
        description: This parameter will filter the content based on month. The minimum
          month allowed is 1 and the maximum allowed is 12This parameter does nothing
          if used without the year parameter, as filtering and aggregating by month
          makes no sense without filtering by year. This parameter is also ignored
          when using multiple year parameters, so it only works if and only if the
          year parameter has one value.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      - name: monthly
        in: query
        description: When true, this parameter will add an extra layer of monthly
          grouping of all results. The default is false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: bidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds to the tender.items.classification._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidTypeId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidTypeId filter, matches elements
          that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: procuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/procuring entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notProcuringEntityId
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated procuringEntityId filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: supplierId
        in: query
        description: This is the id of the organization/supplier entity. Corresponds
          to the OCDS Organization.identifier
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: bidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: notBidSelectionMethod
        in: query
        description: This corresponds the negated bidSelectionMethod filter, matches
          elements that are NOT in the list of Ids
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: contrMethod
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.contrMethod.id, Values range from
          1 to 5.
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: tenderLoc
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.items.deliveryLocation._id
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: minTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/tenderValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxTenderValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after tender.value.amount and will specify a
          maximum.Use /api/tenderValueInterval to get the maximum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: minAwardValue
        in: query
        description: This will filter after awards.value.amount and will specify a
          minimumUse /api/awardValueInterval to get the minimum allowed.
        schema:
          type: number
          format: double
      - name: maxAwardValue

          type: number
          format: double

        explode: true

components:
  schemas:
    Organization:
      type: object
      properties:
        additionalIdentifiers:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Identifier'
        address:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
        contactPoint:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContactPoint'
        id:
          type: string
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Identifier'
        name:
          type: string
        types:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
            - procuringEntity
            - buyer
            - supplier
    Address:
      type: object
      properties:
        countryName:
          type: string
        locality:
          type: string
        postalCode:
          type: string
        region:
          type: string
        streetAddress:
          type: string
    Document:
      type: object
      properties:
        dateModified:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        datePublished:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        description:
          type: string
        documentType:
          type: string
        format:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        language:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
    Unit:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        value:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amount'
    DBObject:
      type: object
      properties:
        partialObject:
          type: boolean
    Implementation:
      type: object
      properties:
        documents:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Document'
        milestones:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Milestone'
        transactions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Transaction'
    ContactPoint:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
        faxNumber:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        telephone:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
    Item:
      type: object
      properties:
        additionalClassifications:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Classification'
        classification:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Classification'
        deliveryLocation:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/VNLocation'
        description:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        quantity:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        unit:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Unit'
    Amendment:
      type: object
      properties:
        changes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Change'
        date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        rationale:
          type: string
    FrequentSuppliersId:
      type: object
      properties:
        procuringEntityId:
          type: string
        supplierId:
          type: string
        timeInterval:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    Identifier:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        legalName:
          type: string
        scheme:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    FlaggedRelease:
      type: object
      properties:
        awards:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Award'
        buyer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
        contracts:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Contract'
        date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        flags:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReleaseFlags'
        id:
          type: string
        initiationType:
          type: string
          enum:
          - tender
        language:
          type: string
        ocid:
          type: string
        planning:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Planning'
        tag:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
            - planning
            - tender
            - tenderAmendment
            - tenderUpdate
            - tenderCancellation
            - award
            - awardUpdate
            - awardCancellation
            - contract
            - contractUpdate
            - contractAmendment
            - implementation
            - implementationUpdate
            - contractTermination
            - compiled
        tender:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tender'
    Classification:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        scheme:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    OrgDepartment:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        name:
          type: string
    Budget:
      type: object
      properties:
        amount:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amount'
        description:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        project:
          type: string
        projectID:
          type: string
        source:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    ValueObject:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TendererPair'
        value:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ValueTuple'
    Release:
      type: object
      properties:
        awards:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Award'
        buyer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
        contracts:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Contract'
        date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        id:
          type: string
        initiationType:
          type: string
          enum:
          - tender
        language:
          type: string
        ocid:
          type: string
        planning:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Planning'
        tag:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
            - planning
            - tender
            - tenderAmendment
            - tenderUpdate
            - tenderCancellation
            - award
            - awardUpdate
            - awardCancellation
            - contract
            - contractUpdate
            - contractAmendment
            - implementation
            - implementationUpdate
            - contractTermination
            - compiled
        tender:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tender'
    VNLocation:
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
        gazetteer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Gazetteer'
        gazetteerPrefix:
          type: string
        geometry:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GeoJsonPoint'
        id:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    ReleaseFlags:
      type: object
      properties:
        i003:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i004:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i007:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i019:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i038:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i077:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
        i180:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Flag'
    Milestone:
      type: object
      properties:
        dateModified:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        description:
          type: string
        documents:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Document'
        dueDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        id:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
          - met
          - notMet
          - partiallyMet
        title:
          type: string
    Amount:
      type: object
      properties:
        amount:
          type: number
          format: double
        currency:
          type: string
    Period:
      type: object
      properties:
        endDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        startDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
    TendererPair:
      type: object
      properties:
        tendererId1:
          type: string
        tendererId2:
          type: string
    City:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        name:
          type: string
    Change:
      type: object
      properties:
        former_value:
          type: string
        property:
          type: string
    Publisher:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        scheme:
          type: string
        uid:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    Flag:
      type: object
      properties:
        rationale:
          type: string
        value:
          type: boolean
    Tender:
      type: object
      properties:
        amendment:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amendment'
        awardCriteria:
          type: string
        awardCriteriaDetails:
          type: string
        awardPeriod:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        description:
          type: string
        documents:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Document'
        eligibilityCriteria:
          type: string
        enquiryPeriod:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        hasEnquiries:
          type: boolean
        id:
          type: string
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        milestones:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Milestone'
        minValue:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amount'
        numberOfTenderers:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        procurementMethod:
          type: string
          enum:
          - open
          - selective
          - limited
        procurementMethodRationale:
          type: string
        procuringEntity:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
          - planned
          - active
          - cancelled
          - unsuccessful
          - complete
        submissionMethod:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
            - electronicAuction
            - electronicSubmission
            - written
            - inPerson
        submissionMethodDetails:
          type: string
        tenderPeriod:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        tenderers:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
        title:
          type: string
        value:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amount'
    ReleasePackage:
      type: object
      properties:
        license:
          type: string
        publicationPolicy:
          type: string
        publishedDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        publisher:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Publisher'
        releases:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Release'
        uri:
          type: string
    ContrMethod:
      type: object
      properties:
        details:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
    Transaction:
      type: object
      properties:
        amount:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amount'
        date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        id:
          type: string
        providerOrganization:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Identifier'
        receiverOrganization:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Identifier'
        source:
          type: string
        uri:
          type: string
    ValueTuple:
      type: object
      properties:
        pairCount:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        winner1Count:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        winner2Count:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    Award:
      type: object
      properties:
        amendment:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Amendment'
        contractPeriod:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        date:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        description:
          type: string
        documents:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Document'
        id:
          type: string
        items:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        status:
          type: string
          enum:
          - pending
          - active
